DOC.brief_summary: Retrospective medical chart review HIV-infected patient diagnose progressive multifocal leukoencephalopathy
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Study Survival Patients Suffering From Hiv-related Progressive Multifocal Leukoencephalopathy
DOC.criteria: HIV infect patient Diagnosed progressive multifocal leukoencephalopathy Minimal followup one year OR patient decease less one year diagnosis Loss followup within 12 month diagnosis
